txt.en: King Thorin III has asked you to try to locate an ancient relic known as the Secret Stone. But what dangers did the poem warn about? Can you solve this mystery on your own?\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This difficult treasure hunt will require community teamwork and resources outside of the game itself. Good luck! </rgb>
TBD
King Thorin III thinks the lost pages of the tome may point the way to the Secret Stone.\n\nYou should follow the clues of the rune scraps.
The missing pages of the tome have given you many clues to follow, but this is not the end of your adventure. The Secret Stone awaits!
'Binakhrâm? That is our word for the Nameless. It sounds like you are on the right track!'
King Thorin III thinks the lost pages of the tome may point the way to the Secret Stone.\n\nYou should follow the clues of the rune scraps.

Find the lost pages of the tome

'[placeholder], I will trust you with this task because you have been a friend to my people before. I want you to find the Secret Stone and return it to me. 

'The warnings were clear. This is a dangerous and powerful artifact. But, I believe the risk to be worth the danger. The craftsmanship of my people is fading, and we are desperate to find a solution. An ancient artifact of Khazad-dûm may BE that solution! At the same time, it worries me that this secret knowledge was just left out for anyone to find. Someone may have sinister intentions for it.

'This may be an impossible task. For all we know, the Stone may be lost forever. But, should you manage to find it, please bring it to me. Perhaps the place to start is these missing pages. See if you can find any of them here, in Erebor.'

<rgb=#FF0000> This difficult treasure hunt will require community teamwork and resources outside of the game itself. Good luck! </rgb>
King Thorin III thinks the lost pages of the tome may point the way to the Secret Stone.\n\nPerhaps one of the pages is inside Erebor.
